participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Family-oriented and practical, Michael enjoys spending quality time with his loved ones.
participant_1.background: my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. my wife and kids are the best. i'm a plumber.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Active and spontaneous, Sarah likes to keep herself engaged and enjoys staying fit.
participant_2.background: eating is something i do when i am bored. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. two dogs live with me.
